Description:
Do you fearlessly embrace the challenge of exceeding sales targets?
Does the mere thought of client requirements fail to bore you?
Do in-person meetings with clients fail to tire you?
Do you boldly approach doors, showcasing your exceptional products/services?
Does the relentless pursuit of daily calls never deter your sleep?If the above descriptions resonate with your unstoppable drive, seize this golden opportunity to showcase your true potential and conquer new heights.RequirementsProven experience as a Business Developer or in a similar sales role
Fearless approach towards exceeding sales targets and delivering exceptional results
Strong passion for understanding and fulfilling client requirements
Ability to thrive in in-person meetings with clients, showcasing excellent interpersonal and communication skills
Self-motivated and driven individual who is not deterred by daily calls and embraces them as opportunities for success
Must be based in Riyadh, Saudi ArabiaBenefitsCompetitive salary and commission structure
Opportunity to work with a dynamic and innovative team
Professional growth and development opportunities
Collaborative and supportive work environment
Chance to be part of an industry-leading company in the digital services and products sectorJob Details
